holidays.title: National Hug a Newsperson Day
holidays.description: Warm up those hugging muscles because we’re showing our appreciation for newspeople in a big way.

holidays.title: 404 Day
holidays.description: Celebrate one of the most important days by indulging your need for free expression.

holidays.title: Cheng Ming Festival
holidays.description: Honor your ancestors’ lives by burning a candle and paying your respects to them.

holidays.title: Discover National Parks Fortnight
holidays.description: Get off the couch, grab your backpack, and head outdoors to enjoy a few beautiful views.

holidays.title: International Carrot Day
holidays.description: Shake off the dirt and wear your best orange on this International Carrot Day.

holidays.title: International Day for Landmine Awareness and Assistance in Mine Action
holidays.description: Let’s pay homage to those working to make war zones habitable on holiday.

holidays.title: International Day for Mine Awareness and Assistance in Mine Action
holidays.description: This  International Day for Mine Awareness and Assistance in Mine Action, let’s make the world landmine-free.

holidays.title: Jeep 4×4 Day
holidays.description: Rev those engines and hit an off-road trail, it's National Jeep 4x4 Day.

holidays.title: Näfelser Fahrt
holidays.description: Let’s observe the day by taking a pilgrimage to the site of the Habsburgs battle.

holidays.title: National Alcohol Screening Day
holidays.description: Let’s say no to alcohol, and yes to a healthy body and mind. Let’s take action!

holidays.title: National Cordon Bleu Day
holidays.description: This dish comes conferred with the highest honor, join us in paying homage!

holidays.title: National Dillon Day
holidays.description: Let the mighty roar of the Dillons of the world ring through this day of honor!

holidays.title: National Walk Around Things Day
holidays.description: Vague but also compelling, right? We circle back to how this day may have started.

holidays.title: Qingming Festival
holidays.description: Qingming Festival is when people honor their ancestors through traditional food offerings and by sweeping tombs.

holidays.title: School Librarian Day
holidays.description: School librarians are invaluable as they inculcate the habit of reading and lifelong learning.

holidays.title: Senegal Independence Day
holidays.description: Have you ever heard about Senegal’s story of gaining freedom from France? Read on!

holidays.title: Tell a Lie Day
holidays.description: There are certain times when lying is acceptable, Tell A Lie Day is one of those times.

holidays.title: Victims of Violence Wholly Day
holidays.description: On Victims of Violence Wholly Day, let’s honor and stand with those fighting racial injustice.

holidays.title: Vitamin C Day
holidays.description: Vitamin C is good for us. But how, exactly? Read on to learn more.

holidays.title: World Rat Day
holidays.description: Today, let us learn more about the world’s most underappreciated, underrated, yet adorable pet.

holidays.title: Daniel Lara’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s get to know media influencer, Daniel Lara, for whom nothing is impossible.

holidays.title: Eric Andre’s Birthday
holidays.description: Explore the many facets of this multi-talented actor, stand-up comedian, television host, and writer.

holidays.title: Grumpy Cat’s Birthday
holidays.description: What an honor it is to learn about the legendary and inspiring Grumpy Cat.

holidays.title: Jill Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no boundaries for this multi-talented actress, poet, singer, songwriter, and all-rounded creative.

holidays.title: Maya Angelou’s Birthday
holidays.description: Legendary is the only way to describe Maya Angelou — a powerful poet, memoirist, and activist.

holidays.title: Robert Downey Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: It is incredible what Robert Downey Jr. has been able to achieve throughout his career.
